Name: REVENGER
About the game: A fast-paced, tough as nails first-person shooter evocative of the direct-to-video action flicks of the 1980’s, Revenger is a short, but memorable experience about one man’s hunt to rescue his daughter, and kill everyone responsible for her kidnapping.
